entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain or snow beginning near midnight then changing to light snow before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
